items.title: Nicholas Metropolis - Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
items.snippet:
The algorithm for generating samples from the Boltzmann distribution was later 
generalized by W.K. Hastings to become the Metropolis-Hastings algorithm.
items.htmlSnippet:
The algorithm for generating samples from the Boltzmann distribution was later
generalized by W.K. Hastings to become the Metropolis-Hastings algorithm.
